K10D0102_H0105:413b-13: skye bo bdag gi mdun na rgyug /

K10D0102_H0105:413b-16: ri dvags rnams ni ma nyes par //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-17: bdag gis mdas kyang ri dvags bsad //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-18: 'jig rten phyi ma ma shes pas //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-20: bdag gis gzhan gyi sha zos pas //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-21: de phyir bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-23: 'chi ba bdag gis ma shes te //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-24: bdag ni byis pa'i blor gyur pas //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-25: bdag gi lus kyang gso ba byas //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-27: skyabs byed pa ni su yang med //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-28: gnyen rnams khyed cag thams cad kyang //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-29: nga yi gdong du bltar ci yod //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-30: ci zhig phyir ni gos 'dral zhing //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-31: ci phyir ngu zhing smre sngags 'don //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-32: ci phyir skra rnams rab 'jig cing //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-33: ci phyir khrag kyang 'byin par byed //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-34: ci phyir mgo la rdul 'thor zhing //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-35: brang yang rab tu rdung bar byed //
K10D0102_H0105:413b-36: bdag gson tshe na sdig pa rnams //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-2: bdag gi lus ni spyang ki dang //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-3: khyi dang bya rog rnams dang ni //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-4: bya rnams kyis kyang bza' bar 'gyur //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-5: lus 'di dgos pa med par gsos /
K10D0102_H0105:414a-6: 'chi ba'i sbrul dang ldan gyur nas //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-7: mi ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-9: de lta bu yi sman rnams bsnyen //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-10: bdag la sman pas gang byin pa'i //

K10D0102_H0105:414a-12: da ltar chos kyi sman rnams ni //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-13: 'chi khar bdag la sbyin par byos //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-14: sha ni nga la ma sbyin cig /
K10D0102_H0105:414a-15: lus 'di gso ba byas kyang ni //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-17: gang phyir sdug bsngal spyin gyur pa //
K10D0102_H0105:414a-18: sdig gi phung po ci phyir blangs //

K10D0102_H0105:414a-26: khyed cag gso bar bya ba'i phyir //

K10D0102_H0105:414a-28: da ni 'chi dus bab pa na //

K10D0102_H0105:414b-0: @414b bdag la bsod nams chung shes nas //
K10D0102_H0105:414b-1: skye bo gzhan dag mya ngan byed //

K10D0102_H0105:414b-6: ma rig pas ni byis pa rnams //
K10D0102_H0105:414b-7: gang na thar pa med par 'khyams //
K10D0102_H0105:414b-8: thar pa'i don ni mi shes nas //

K10D0102_H0105:414b-10: nyon mongs rnams kyis byis pa 'khyams //

K10D0102_H0105:414b-27: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par de

K10D0102_H0105:414b-30: sdig pa'i las ni byas pas na //

K10D0102_H0105:422b-2: gang gis sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yi //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-3: chos ni bdag cag ma thos kyi //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-4: bdag cag rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-5: gnas brtan myur du bzhud du gsol //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-6: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-8: de srid bdag cag mi rgal zhes //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-9: thams cad gus dang bcas par gnas //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-11: khyed cag de ltar ci zhig mthong //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-12: re zhig gyen du blta bar byos //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-13: de dag gyen du bltas pa dang //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-14: khang pa brtsegs pa sum stong dang //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-15: lnga brgya tham par tshang ba zhig /
K10D0102_H0105:422b-16: kun tu yang ni gnas par gyur //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-17: rin chen bdun gyis shin tu spras //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-18: rin chen dra bas legs par brgyan //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-19: dbus na me tog rab tu rgyas //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-20: lha rdzas spos kyang rab tu bab //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-21: de na gnas brtan dris pa ni //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-22: khang brtsegs rin chen dra ba dang //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-23: padma ze bar kun gnas par //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-26: gnas 'di dag ni khyed kyi ste //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-27: sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyir dengs shing /
K10D0102_H0105:422b-29: 'jig rten snang byed de la thud //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-31: de yi lam yang ma 'tshal te //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma mthong na; ;gang na lam yang ma 'tshal bas //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-33: phyag 'tshal du ni gang du mchi //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-35: nam mkha' mtha' yas ji bzhin du //
K10D0102_H0105:422b-36: reg par rung ba ma yin pas //
K10D0102_H0105:423a-3: ji ltar ri rab gnas pa ltar //

K10D0102_H0105:423a-5: ri rab gzhal du rung ba yin //
K10D0102_H0105:423a-6: rgya mtsho chen po gting tshod zin //
K10D0102_H0105:423a-7: stong gsum rdul phran dpag tu rung //
K10D0102_H0105:423a-8: sangs rgyas 'byung ba shes ma yin //

K10D0102_H0105:423a-19: sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'dzin to //

K10D0102_H0105:423a-21: sangs rgyas la yang skyabs song ba //

K10D0102_H0105:423a-26: de sems rab tu dang byas nas //
K10D0102_H0105:423a-27: de nas ston pa mthong bar 'gyur //

K10D0102_H0105:423a-31: dpa' chen po sman gyi sde stan las langs nas
K10D0102_H0105:423a-32: mdzad do // / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /

K10D0102_H0105:423b-15: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu ste /

K10D0102_H0105:423b-20: / bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bgyis nas /

K10D0102_H0105:424b-15: deng chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bar 'gyur te /
